sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Employee Seperation">b0cf0962937bb110d0ac703efaba1006</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Allow only future dates on SP_dates</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
	var seperationDate = g_form.getValue('seperation_date'); //getting the value of seperation date and storing it in a variable 

	if (new Date(seperationDate) < getTomorrowDate()) { //converts D entered seperationdate to a JS date object and checks if its less tha tommorows date
		alert('Seperation Date should be in the future.'); //if enteerd date is in the past displaye alert
		g_form.setValue('seperation_date', ''); //clears out the value set on our seperation date varioable feild

		return false; //prevents catalog submission if condition is met

	}   
	return True; //alows the catalog submission if condition isnt met.
   
}
function getTomorrowDate() {  //create a function to calculate and returns tommorows date.
	var today = new Date();  //creates a new Date object representing the current date and time
	var tomorrow = new Date(today); //creates a copy of the currrent date.
	tomorrow.setDate(today.getDate() + 1); //sets the date of our copied current date (object) to one day ahead which equal tommorow
	return tomorrow;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-24 01:56:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>372e062f93777110d0ac703efaba1027</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Allow only future dates on SP_dates</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Human Resource" source="x_994488_hr">c90746c593033110d0ac703efaba1028</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Human Resource">c90746c593033110d0ac703efaba1028</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_372e062f93777110d0ac703efaba1027</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-24 02:06:08</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
